text.div:
NCDHC Observation Vaccination Schedule Completion Status

http://hl7.org.au/fhir/ch/v1/ValueSet/ncdhc-observation-vac-sch-comp-status-1

National Children Digital Health Collaborative - Observation Vaccination Schedule Completion Status - Contains the codes for the status of whether the individual is up-to-date with their vaccinations as per the Australian Immunisation Schedule.

name: ncdhc-observation-vac-sch-comp-status
title: NCDHC Observation Vaccination Schedule Completion Status
description: National Children Digital Health Collaborative - Observation Vaccination Schedule Completion Status - Contains the codes for the status of whether the individual is up-to-date with their vaccinations as per the Australian Immunisation Schedule.

filter.value: (171258008|Up-to-date with vaccinations| OR 171259000|Not up to date with vaccinations|)
